sentences.en: Cute, cuddly, fleece - covered alpacas don't quite fit the image of a snarling guard dog.
sentences.cn: 毛绒绒的羊驼十分可爱, 令人忍不住想去爱抚, 其形象与咆哮的护羊犬相去甚远.

sentences.en: Don't you think that a rabbit is cute and cuddly?
sentences.cn: 你是否又知道现在你所见到的宠物兔,都来自于同一品种?

sentences.en: Gu Gu is not your typical soft and cuddly giant panda.
sentences.cn: “古古”(音译)不是你想象的异常温柔和喜欢爱抚的大熊猫.

sentences.en: He is the most affectionate and cuddly dog I have ever known.
sentences.cn: 它是我所知的最亲热和最可爱的狗。

sentences.en: He's cute, he's soft, he cuddly, he's the one I want to get!
sentences.cn: 他是可爱的, 他是柔软的, 他令人想拥抱, 他是我想要得到的!

sentences.en: I'm sweet and I'm cuddly -- I'm gonna kill that green dog!
sentences.cn: 我既甜美又令人想拥抱 ─ ─而且我要杀了那只绿毛犬!

sentences.en: Koala: The Living Teddy BearKoala bears are cute mammals that resemble a cuddly teddy bear.
sentences.cn: 考拉熊是一种非常可爱的哺乳动物,这和可爱的泰迪熊很像.

sentences.en: So cuddly. The beautiful crib from Mom and Dad.
sentences.cn: 抱起来真舒服. 爸爸妈妈送的漂亮婴儿床.

sentences.en: Sorry, but cuddly stuffed animals -- another infant suffocation danger --- should get evicted.
sentences.cn: 搂着绒毛玩具睡觉有可能引起婴儿窒息,因此应该杜绝.

sentences.en: The British aren't so cuddly if you are on piece of land they want.
sentences.cn: 站在某片英国人觊觎过的土地上,你还会觉得他们那么可爱么?

sentences.en: You can't call a hedgehog cuddly – that is a contradiction in terms!
sentences.cn: 你不能说刺猬逗人喜爱-那个说法在词语上自相矛盾.

sentences.en: You can't call a hedgehog cuddly – that's a contradiction in terms!
sentences.cn: 你不能说刺猬逗人喜爱——那个说法,词语自相矛盾.

sentences.en: You're not fat Molly, you're solid and cuddly.
sentences.cn: “莫利你不胖, 你结实而可爱. ”

words.tran_cn: 拥抱；偎依；舒服地贴著身睡
拥抱；亲热地搂住；抚爱地拥抱
令人想拥抱的；喜欢搂搂抱抱的；逗人喜爱的

trans.tran_cn: 不由得想搂抱的，可爱的，令人想拥抱的
trans.tran_en: a person or animal that is cuddly makes you want to cuddle them
